Along with earning the extremely distinguished honor of being first to find the flyers, Yuffie also strengthened her bonds with her fellow countryman─Old Snapper.
Yuffie left the Sector 7 undercity behind without finding all the flyers.

Yuffie has come to Midgar at the behest of the interim Wutai government to wrest a powerful orb of materia from Shinra's evil clutches. First, however, she must find her Avalanche coconspirators, and to do that, she has to look for posters of moogles and a man with a moogle hat.
Follow the moogle posters to meet up with Avalanche.
Follow the moogle posters to meet up with Avalanche.
Having followed the moogle posters, Yuffie manages to arrive in the Sector 7 undercity, where she meets a collaborator named Zhijie. She then follows him toward Avalanche's base.
The elevator Yuffie found has a moogle poster on it, but the elevator is on a different floor. Find a way to lower it.
Hit the power button and lower the elevator.
Having successfully lowered the elevator, Yuffie continues her search for moogle posters.
Save the robed man from those fiends.
Though the robed man is now safe, he does not appear to be wearing any moogle paraphernalia.
Follow Zhijie to meet the other members of Avalanche.
Having followed Zhijie to Avalanche's base, Yuffie meets the rest of the organization.
Talk to the various members of Avalanche to learn about Midgar.
Having collected all the intel she can, Yuffie must now wait for her partner, Sonon, to return.
Having talked with Billy Bob, Yuffie now knows that the Shinra Building resides in a different part of the city above them.
Now that she has talked with Polk, Yuffie knows she needs a device called a "High-D" (?) to get topside.
Thanks to her interaction with Nayo, Yuffie now knows that materia is developed in the basement of the Shinra Building.
Do some recon while awaiting Sonon's return.
Sonon should be back by now, so return to base when ready.
Yuffie has now officially met Sonon, and the two depart with Nayo for a warehouse in municipal storage.
Talk to Chadley, who can be found near the neighborhood watch's headquarters.
Chadley has explained the concept of the combat simulator to Yuffie. Apparently, it can be used to fight a being called a "summon."
Find Old Snapper, a man who goes around town posting flyers for the Happy Turtle.
Upon locating Old Snapper, he tells Yuffie she'll be rewarded handsomely for finding the six flyers he has posted.
When ready, talk to Nayo in front of the base.
Head with Nayo to the handoff spot.
Head with Nayo to the handoff spot.
Having obtained their cards from the vendor, Yuffie and Sonon head for the hideout again.
Return to Avalanche's base of operations.
The group receives a missive from Zhijie explaining they should now meet at the pillar, so they head for it.
Head to the pillar, where Zhijie will be waiting.
The authorities start to question Zhijie, and he runs off toward the station. Yuffie and Sonon follow in hot pursuit.
Zhijie runs deep into the shipping facility in an effort to ditch the security officers. Things could be better for him.
Head for the upper level, where Zhijie is.
Follow Zhijie, as he has run deeper into the facility.
Follow Zhijie, as he has run deeper into the facility.
Zhijie is apparently in custody somewhere in main pillar maintenance. Yuffie and Sonon head there in order to rescue him.
Find the switch that turns off the converyor belt.
Now that the conveyor belt has been stopped, the two resume their search for Zhijie.
Return to the mid-level of the facility, where Zhijie was last.
After returning to the mid-level, Yuffie and Sonon hear that Zhijie has been captured. The situation seems dire, to say the least.
Hurry to where Zhijie is being held.
Yuffie and Sonon reach main pillar maintenance and enter the facility in search of Zhijie.
The two succeed in defeating the gigantipede and rescue Zhijie, who gives them the other set of IDs they need. Now all that's left is to board the train.
When ready, head to Sector 7 Undercity Station.
Thanks to Avalanche, the two Wutai agents can now carry out their mission. As their train makes its way toward the upper part of the city, their chests tighten in anticipation.
Search the facility and steal the ultimate materia.
Having dispatched the opposition Scarlet sent their way, Yuffie and Sonon continue their hunt for the materia.
Look for a way up to the exit.
Lower the ladder so Sonon can rejoin you.
After dropping the container, Yuffie and Sonon are able to reach the open door to continue their search.
Explore the facilities and steal the ultimate materia.
Explore the facilities and steal the ultimate materia.
The pair were able to activate the central terminal and bring the power back online. With a way up now available to them, they climb higher.
Explore the facilities and steal the ultimate materia.
Explore the facilities and steal the ultimate materia.
The two were able to restore power by accessing the central terminal. Using the security grate, they climb to the next floor up.
Yuffie and Sonon can now use Shinra's training facility.
Explore the facilities and steal the ultimate materia.
Restore power to the main system.
Find out if the materia in that room is indeed the ultimate materia.
Yuffie and Sonon find themselves at a loss as to the materia's whereabouts, but Scarlet suddenly appears before them with a message.
Select an opponent and proceed to the first trial.
Select an opponent and proceed to the second trial.
Select an opponent and proceed to the third trial.
Select an opponent and proceed to the fourth trial.
Select an opponent and proceed to the fifth trial.
Yuffie and Sonon survive the ordnance testing, but Scarlet has more in store for them.
Yuffie and Sonon manage to successfully take down The Crimson Mare and capture Scarlet. However, she delivers unwelcome news about not only the ultimate materia, but Sector 7 as well.
New, unknown troopers stand in Yuffie and Sonon's way. After being overwhelmed, the two realize they've been trapped in a small chamber within the facility.
Now that the pair have brought down the projection system─and forcibly put an end to the simulation─the door unlocks.
Yuffie and Sonon make for the exit, their path strewn with bodies mutilated by an unknown assailant. Before they can find a way out, though, they encounter darkness incarnate.
Her mission failed and a dear friend lost, Yuffie wanders the barren wastelands alone with a heavy heart. However, for this Wutaian ninja with an indomitable spirit, the journey has only just begun.

Yuffie and Sonon arrive at the entrance to the Shinra Building to find it packed with reporters following the latest reactor bombing. After slipping through the crowd, the pair use their counterfeit employee IDs and make for the basement, where Shinra's ultimate materia awaits.

I hope you will continue to help me gather vital information for my research.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I have to tell you that I am grateful for all of your help thus far.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I've done it. I've developed a new materia!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud, welcome back. Unfortunately, you were not the first to provide the data I requested.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: However, it is possible for you to purchase my new materia.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I plan to develop more materia in the future. Together, we can harness enough power to take down Shinra.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I'll keep preparing more battle intel reports, which I hope you will assist me in completing.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud. I've been waiting for you.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I cannot thank you enough for helping me complete all of my reports!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I had calculated a near-zero percent chance of success, but you defied the odds─and in record time at that!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Guess that's it for our arrangement. So─what's next for you?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Materia research was but one of my pursuits─one which pales in importance to my desire to destroy Shinra.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: That's what I'll be devoting my time to next. I hope I can count on your assistance in this endeavor as well.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Guess that's it for our arrangement.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I know we've only just completed our battle reports, but there's still so much more I need your help with.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Shinra is a powerful enemy─one which I cannot defeat alone.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Now then, would you care to see the materia I developed with the aid of your final report?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: If there's anything you require, please do not hesitate to ask.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud, I've come up with the most fascinating theory. Perhaps you can lend me your assistance in gathering data to test it?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I have registered a new battle intel request. Please, take a look.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: This will be the final request that I make of you. Your assistance would be greatly appreciated.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud, I have the most amazing news!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I believe I might know how to develop summoning materia, something heretofore thought impossible.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Scientists say that this materia can only be found in nature, but I may just be able to prove otherwise!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: And so, Cloud, I turn to you. I would like to test this theory by way of my combat simulator─
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: to wit, I want you to fight and defeat summon data in VR.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I sense that you find my phrasing to be somewhat...obtuse.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Please let me know when you have made your preparations.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud, I've registered a new summons battle intel request. Please take a look.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I need you to defeat the summoned entity so I can complete the materia.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Are you prepared for your fight against the virtual summon?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text:
I look forward to receiving all of your future
battle intel submissions.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I will be here if you require anything else.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: At all times I am remotely analyzing your combat data and monitoring your progress.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I hope you will continue to lend me your assistance.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud, I... I do hope you won't forget about me.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I sense a...a sudden surge of emotion in my future.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I understand you must be busy, but I hope you haven't forgotten about my research.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Oh, hello. Cloud has been assisting me with my research and development.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Ooh, that sounds fun. Count me in.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: One moment while I run diagnostics.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Huh... How very strange... You don't appear to be in my database...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: There must have been some sort of server error. Oh well, any friend of Cloud's is sure to be of great help.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I understand you must be busy, but I hope you haven't forgotten about my research.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I will go wherever my research leads me, but the success of my endeavors rests entirely upon you.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Your assistance would be much appreciated.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Ah, I sense now isn't the best time to discuss my research. Find me again when you have a moment.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Perhaps we should discuss my research later.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Forgive me, miss, but the way you're staring at me is rather...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I will go wherever my research leads me, but the success of my endeavors rests entirely upon you.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Your assistance would be much appreciated.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I'm glad to see that you're okay.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: In these trying times I hope to develop new materia to help us endure.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Cloud. I've been waiting for you.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: You haven't forgotten me, have you? I'm an intern in the R&D Division here.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I took the liberty of hacking into the executives' private network to monitor your progress through the building.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I will support you in any way that I can.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I sense a surge in trust.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: We should keep this brief to avoid suspicion.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: We should keep this brief to avoid suspicion.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Outstanding. The Shiva summoning materia is complete.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: And now it's yours. Use it as you see fit.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: The lady of frost is the perfect companion for a man like you, Cloud.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: She will prove most useful when the time comes to destroy Shinra.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: This is incontrovertible proof that the universe has a sense of humor.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Now that you have a fun new partner in Fat Chocobo, you can work together to squash Shinra like a bug.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Leviathan, the patron deity of Wutai, is not an enemy to be trifled with.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Together, you can cleanse the world of the Shinra scourge.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: What an impressive feat to hold your own against one of the most exalted summons known to man.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Together with the legendary Bahamut, I have every confidence you can expunge Shinra from existence.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Every fight brings me one step closer to understanding you. You are a mystery I simply cannot wait to solve.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Well done, Cloud! I have compiled some rather fascinating data.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Another battle awaits! Find me when you're ready.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: What a shame. It was a close match. However, I did manage to obtain valuable data.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Analyze and learn from your mistakes, so that you can claim victory next time.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: That was unfortunate...but remember: your limitations are only in your mind.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Was there a problem? I know the system is functioning properly... Take a moment to catch your breath and then try again.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I took the liberty of hacking into the executives' private network to monitor your progress through the building.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I will support you in any way that I can.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I sense a surge in trust.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: As I divulged to you before, despite being a loyal employee of Shinra...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I seek to destroy the company from within.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: It would mean my life if anyone knew I was conducting this research. Hojo's madness is clearly rubbing off on me.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: He is the reason I pursue this research. I want nothing more than to be free of him.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I cannot go into details, but I can say that it is complicated.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: For now, I need to focus on my research, and nothing else.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: At present, I mean to focus on my newest research, as I've found an absolutely fascinating subject...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: it is none other than you, Cloud!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Were we to unlock your tremendous potential, we would have the strength to destroy both Shinra and Hojo.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: So please provide me with new battle intel and assist me in my research.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I will pit you against virtual enemies constructed from the data you've provided me thus far.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: When you feel that you are ready to begin, please proceed to the newly reconstructed combat simulator.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Hone your skills against these constructs, so that we may stand together against Shinra!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: When you feel that you are ready to begin, please proceed to the newly reconstructed combat simulator.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Hone your skills against these constructs, so that we may stand together against Shinra!
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: A pleasure to see you again, Cloud. How can I be of service?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Of course, you are welcome to use this top-of-the-line combat simulator anytime you wish.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Or would you prefer the portable version?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: A pleasure to see you again, Cloud. How can I be of service?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: This is it, the final challenge. The greatest trial you may yet face, and the culmination of our collective research.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: You will be facing a weapon possessed of such destructive potential that the military deemed it too dangerous to deploy.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: It is, quite frankly, an abomination.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: The entirety of my research and your data has been uploaded into it.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: If you possess the strength to defeat this weapon, then I know we will have what it takes to one day destroy Shinra.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: And I...I will be free of Hojo at last. So...Cloud... I'm counting on you.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: You've managed to fully tap into the potential once locked within you.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Now that my research is at long last complete...I believe that it's time I told you the truth about myself.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I'm...not human. I'm a cyborg created to serve as Hojo's assistant.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I was given knowledge and power beyond that of a human...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: ...But I was robbed of free will, bound to obey the whims of my master.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: But when we met, Cloud, I sensed something within you─something I knew would allow me to break free of my chains.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: By identifying and studying a subject with infinite potential such as yourself...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I could adhere to the directives imposed upon me...all the while pursuing my plans for independence in secret.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Your combat data provided me with the vital information that I required to enhance my basic functionality...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Through my research and with your assistance, I have freed myself from Hojo's bondage.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I cannot thank you enough for your help.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: You've given me the power to finally live life on my own terms.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: So...what are you gonna do now?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'm not sure. It's all a big, wonderful mystery.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: It's nice not knowing something for a change...
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: We've added a new individual's data to the combat simulator.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: I can't divulge any details...but I can say its existence is both highly-classified and extremely dangerous.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: To be completely honest...I had some misgivings about implementing it.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: Even now, I'm still not entirely sure I made the right decision.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: However, I do believe that engaging it in combat will yield vital information.
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: And who better to extract that information than you, Cloud?
data.speaker: Chadley

data.text: If you're willing to try, I'd appreciate the help.
data.speaker: Chadley
